price: Kuma Allah na tsĩrar da waɗanda suka yi taƙawa a game da wurin sãmun babban rabonsu, cũta bã zã tashãfe su ba, kuma ba su zama sunã baƙin ciki ba.
arabic: وَيُنَجِّي ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ بِمَفَازَتِهِمۡ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayunajjī al-lahu alladhīna ittaqaw bimafāzatihim lā yamassuhumu al-sūu walā hum yaḥzanūna
